author: .vbuterin
content: transaction and receipt lists actually are a great use case for SSZ hashing

author: .vbuterin
content: because they are not key/value stores so don't have the usual depth attacks to worry about, and the current structure is needlessly wasteful

author: holiman
content: The modexp repricing EIP is a total trainwreck, IMO. https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-2565-big-integer-modular-exponentiation-eip-198-gas-cost/4150/5?u=holiman

author: shamatar
content: At the moment Vitalik's EIP-2929 does not look to set the constant to calls to precompiles. As far as I remember Geth's safe value is around 40 gas, OE is around 26, Nethermind is also good with 40, and Besu would expect a 100. Is there a chance to get a speedup from Besu for this and converge on something like 40-50 gas?
